text: Hi Cassandra - This is what I'm seeing, but its a fairly skewed sample: Top-tier VC backed startups, mostly bay area and nyc. I've seen data points from 100+ candidates and talked to about 100 founders about marketing hiring over the past year. I find that Canadian (and also European) startups are less likely to give as much equity (we work with a few). This is the most competitive market for marketers I've seen though, and startups are paying up :slightly_smiling_face:
